participant_1.background:
I work for a large company.
I dream of winning the lottery.
I drive a fast car.
I listen to rock music.
I like to eat food.

participant_2.background:
I listen to linking park , i do not know why.
People in school said i was quiet.
I was diagnosed with autism.
I have not done anything since high school.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to listen to music, play video games, and read.
What kind of music do you listen to?
I mostly listen to rock music, but I also like some pop and country music.
Me too! I love rock music. What bands do you like?
I like Linkin Park, Metallica, and Guns N' Roses.
Nice! I like those bands too. What kind of video games do you play?
I mostly play action-adventure games, but I also like some racing and puzzle games.
Me too! I love racing games. What's your favorite racing game?
I like Forza Horizon 4. It's a really fun and realistic racing game.
I've heard good things about that game. I might have to check it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
So, what do you do for work?
I don't have a job right now. I've been unemployed since I graduated from high school.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. Are you looking for a job?
Yeah, I've been applying for jobs, but I haven't had any luck so far.
I'm sure you'll find a job soon. Just keep applying and don't give up.
Thanks for the encouragement. I'll keep trying.
So, what do you plan to do with your life?
I'm not sure. I've been thinking about going to college, but I'm not sure what I want to study.
College is a great option. It gives you a lot of opportunities to learn and grow.
Yeah, I think so too. I'm just not sure what I want to do with my life.
Well, you have plenty of time to figure it out. Just take your time and don't rush into anything.
Thanks for the advice. I appreciate it.
